title: Soya Brigadeiro

preparations.content: Place sugar, water and butter in mixing bowl then heat <b>5 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add soya milk powder and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then mix again <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place 350 g reserved soya condensed milk, cocoa powder and butter in mixing bowl then heat <b>12 min/120°C/speed 4<b>. Spoon into mini paper cases then refrigerate until ready to serve.

hintsAndTricks: The remaining soya condensed milk can be kept in the fridge for up to <b>1 month.<b>
